nodes.title: Math Maturity Tree
nodes.excerpt: A navigable map of math maturity stages and the GR/warp verification walk.
nodes.bodyMD:
Math maturity governs what claims are allowed and what checks are required across the physics stack.

Minimal artifact: Math Status Registry + Evidence Map (MATH_STATUS.md, math.evidence.json).
nodes.summary: A navigable map of math maturity stages and the GR/warp verification walk.

nodes.title: Math Maturity Stages
nodes.excerpt: Stages define which claims are allowed and which checks are required.
nodes.bodyMD:
Stages keep claims proportional to evidence: exploratory, reduced-order, diagnostic, certified.

Minimal artifact: Stage policy + narrative waypoints (shared/math-stage.ts).
nodes.summary: Stages define which claims are allowed and which checks are required.

nodes.title: Stage 0: Exploratory / Proxy
nodes.excerpt: Intuition-building and visualization without hard pass/fail claims.
nodes.bodyMD:
Stage 0 allows qualitative trends, sanity checks, and visualization. Avoid hard viability claims.

Minimal artifact: exploratory notes + unit sanity checks.
nodes.summary: Intuition-building and visualization without hard pass/fail claims.

nodes.title: Stage 1: Reduced-Order / Approximate
nodes.excerpt: Coarse estimates and proxy constraints with regression snapshots.
nodes.bodyMD:
Stage 1 permits simplified dynamics and coarse estimates. Regression snapshots or known-case checks are expected.

Minimal artifact: reduced-order model + regression snapshot.
nodes.summary: Coarse estimates and proxy constraints with regression snapshots.

nodes.title: Stage 2: Diagnostic / High-Fidelity
nodes.excerpt: Constraint residuals and stability checks enable diagnostic claims.
nodes.bodyMD:
Stage 2 supports diagnostic claims when residual thresholds and stability checks pass.

Minimal artifact: residual report + stability check results.
nodes.summary: Constraint residuals and stability checks enable diagnostic claims.

nodes.title: Stage 3: Certified / Policy-Gated
nodes.excerpt: Pass/fail under named constraints with certificate integrity checks.
nodes.bodyMD:
Stage 3 is policy-gated: pass/fail under hard constraints and certificate integrity.

Minimal artifact: WARP_AGENTS.md hard constraints + certificate hash.
nodes.summary: Pass/fail under named constraints with certificate integrity checks.

nodes.title: GR/Warp Pipeline Walk
nodes.excerpt: Narrative walk from energy pipeline to viability certificate.
nodes.bodyMD:
This walk follows the main GR/warp math flow: pipeline -> stress-energy -> GR evolution -> constraints -> viability -> certificate.

Minimal artifact: pipeline trace map (MATH_GRAPH.json).
nodes.summary: Narrative walk from energy pipeline to viability certificate.

nodes.title: Energy Pipeline
nodes.excerpt: Compute dynamic Casimir and warp proxy inputs.
nodes.bodyMD:
Energy pipeline steps assemble dynamic Casimir and warp proxy inputs (server/energy-pipeline.ts).

Minimal artifact: pipeline state snapshot.
nodes.summary: Compute dynamic Casimir and warp proxy inputs.

nodes.title: Stress-Energy Mapping
nodes.excerpt: Map pipeline outputs into stress-energy fields.
nodes.bodyMD:
Stress-energy mapping converts pipeline outputs into fields for GR evolution (server/stress-energy-brick.ts, server/gr/evolution/stress-energy.ts).

Minimal artifact: stress-energy brick report.
nodes.summary: Map pipeline outputs into stress-energy fields.

nodes.title: GR Evolution
nodes.excerpt: Evolve BSSN fields and compute diagnostics.
nodes.bodyMD:
GR evolution integrates BSSN fields and produces diagnostics (server/gr/evolution/solver.ts, server/gr-evolve-brick.ts).

Minimal artifact: residual diagnostics report.
nodes.summary: Evolve BSSN fields and compute diagnostics.

nodes.title: Constraint Gate
nodes.excerpt: Evaluate constraints against threshold policies.
nodes.bodyMD:
Constraint evaluation applies GR thresholds to diagnostics (server/gr/constraint-evaluator.ts).

Minimal artifact: constraint gate summary.
nodes.summary: Evaluate constraints against threshold policies.

nodes.title: Warp Viability
nodes.excerpt: Combine pipeline outputs with guardrails to evaluate viability.
nodes.bodyMD:
Warp viability evaluates pipeline outputs against guardrails (tools/warpViability.ts, modules/physics/warpAgents.ts).

Minimal artifact: viability evaluation summary.
nodes.summary: Combine pipeline outputs with guardrails to evaluate viability.

nodes.title: Viability Certificate
nodes.excerpt: Issue certificate with integrity checks and policy gates.
nodes.bodyMD:
Certificates are issued only after constraint and integrity checks pass (tools/warpViabilityCertificate.ts).

Minimal artifact: certificate hash + integrity OK.
nodes.summary: Issue certificate with integrity checks and policy gates.

nodes.title: Verification Gates
nodes.excerpt: Hard constraints, required tests, and certificate integrity.
nodes.bodyMD:
Verification gates enforce hard constraints and required tests (WARP_AGENTS.md) before certified claims.

Minimal artifact: Casimir verification gate PASS + certificate integrity OK.
nodes.summary: Hard constraints, required tests, and certificate integrity.

nodes.title: Math Evidence Registry
nodes.excerpt: Stage policy, evidence profiles, and dependency graph.
nodes.bodyMD:
Math evidence and stage policy live in math.config.json, math.evidence.json, math.waivers.json, and MATH_GRAPH.json.

Minimal artifact: evidence pack + dependency graph.
nodes.summary: Stage policy, evidence profiles, and dependency graph.

nodes.title: Energy Pipeline Core
nodes.excerpt: Central pipeline calculations and state assembly.
nodes.bodyMD:
Core pipeline logic aggregates dynamic Casimir, QI, and geometry inputs (server/energy-pipeline.ts).

Minimal artifact: pipeline state snapshot.
nodes.summary: Central pipeline calculations and state assembly.

nodes.title: Dynamic Casimir Stack
nodes.excerpt: Dynamic Casimir calculations and geometry coupling.
nodes.bodyMD:
Dynamic Casimir calculations link modulation, geometry, and energy output.

Minimal artifact: dynamic Casimir sweep summary.
nodes.summary: Dynamic Casimir calculations and geometry coupling.

nodes.title: Dynamic Casimir Engine
nodes.excerpt: Compute dynamic Casimir energy and sweep curves.
nodes.bodyMD:
Dynamic Casimir engine executes sweeps and energy estimates (modules/dynamic/dynamic-casimir.ts).

Minimal artifact: sweep curve record.
nodes.summary: Compute dynamic Casimir energy and sweep curves.

nodes.title: Natario Metric Engine
nodes.excerpt: Compute Natario metric helpers for dynamic Casimir.
nodes.bodyMD:
Natario metric helpers supply geometry parameters (modules/dynamic/natario-metric.ts).

Minimal artifact: metric parameter snapshot.
nodes.summary: Compute Natario metric helpers for dynamic Casimir.

nodes.title: Static Casimir Baseline
nodes.excerpt: Compute static Casimir energy baseline.
nodes.bodyMD:
Static Casimir baseline supports dynamic deltas (modules/sim_core/static-casimir.ts).

Minimal artifact: baseline energy value.
nodes.summary: Compute static Casimir energy baseline.

nodes.title: Casimir Inference
nodes.excerpt: Infer energy from force series and datasets.
nodes.bodyMD:
Inference utilities map measured force series to energy (modules/sim_core/casimir-inference.ts).

Minimal artifact: inference fit summary.
nodes.summary: Infer energy from force series and datasets.

nodes.title: QI Guardrails Stack
nodes.excerpt: Quantum-inequality monitoring and control loops.
nodes.bodyMD:
QI guardrails apply Ford-Roman bounds, monitoring, and autoscaling.

Minimal artifact: QI guardrail margin report.
nodes.summary: Quantum-inequality monitoring and control loops.

nodes.title: QI Bounds
nodes.excerpt: Compute Ford-Roman quantum inequality bounds.
nodes.bodyMD:
QI bounds compute limit values and safety margins (server/qi/qi-bounds.ts).

Minimal artifact: bound calculation record.
nodes.summary: Compute Ford-Roman quantum inequality bounds.

nodes.title: QI Monitor
nodes.excerpt: Kernel-based QI monitor for running averages.
nodes.bodyMD:
QI monitor tracks running averages against bounds (server/qi/qi-monitor.ts).

Minimal artifact: monitor snapshot.
nodes.summary: Kernel-based QI monitor for running averages.

nodes.title: QI Saturation Window
nodes.excerpt: Sampling window and saturation estimates.
nodes.bodyMD:
QI saturation computes sampling windows and S values (server/qi/qi-saturation.ts).

Minimal artifact: saturation summary.
nodes.summary: Sampling window and saturation estimates.

nodes.title: QI Telemetry Stream
nodes.excerpt: Live QI telemetry aggregation and snapshots.
nodes.bodyMD:
QI stream gathers tile telemetry and snapshot updates (server/qi/pipeline-qi-stream.ts, server/qi/qi-snap-source.ts, server/qi/qi-snap-broadcaster.ts).

Minimal artifact: QI stream snapshot.
nodes.summary: Live QI telemetry aggregation and snapshots.

nodes.title: QI Autoscale
nodes.excerpt: Autoscale QI controls to hold guardrail margins.
nodes.bodyMD:
QI autoscale adjusts scaling to preserve bounds (server/controls/qi-autoscale.ts).

Minimal artifact: autoscale state record.
nodes.summary: Autoscale QI controls to hold guardrail margins.

nodes.title: QI Autothrottle
nodes.excerpt: Throttle controls to prevent guardrail breaches.
nodes.bodyMD:
QI autothrottle limits pump commands and pulses (server/controls/qi-autothrottle.ts).

Minimal artifact: throttle step log.
nodes.summary: Throttle controls to prevent guardrail breaches.

nodes.title: QI Diagnostics Schema
nodes.excerpt: Schema for QI diagnostic payloads.
nodes.bodyMD:
QI diagnostics schema defines payload fields (shared/qi-diagnostics.ts).

Minimal artifact: diagnostics schema snapshot.
nodes.summary: Schema for QI diagnostic payloads.

nodes.title: Phase Control Stack
nodes.excerpt: Phase scheduling, calibration, and pump control.
nodes.bodyMD:
Phase controls coordinate pump commands and sector scheduling.

Minimal artifact: phase schedule output.
nodes.summary: Phase scheduling, calibration, and pump control.

nodes.title: Phase Scheduler
nodes.excerpt: Compute sector phase offsets and pulse alignment.
nodes.bodyMD:
Phase scheduler computes sector offsets (server/energy/phase-scheduler.ts).

Minimal artifact: phase schedule table.
nodes.summary: Compute sector phase offsets and pulse alignment.

nodes.title: Phase Calibration
nodes.excerpt: Record calibration snapshots for phase tuning.
nodes.bodyMD:
Phase calibration writes and reads calibration snapshots (server/utils/phase-calibration.ts, sim_core/phase_calibration.json).

Minimal artifact: calibration record.
nodes.summary: Record calibration snapshots for phase tuning.

nodes.title: Pump Controls
nodes.excerpt: Drive pump command generation for pulses.
nodes.bodyMD:
Pump controllers generate command tones (server/instruments/pump.ts, server/instruments/pump-multitone.ts).

Minimal artifact: pump command record.
nodes.summary: Drive pump command generation for pulses.

nodes.title: TS Autoscale
nodes.excerpt: Autoscale TS ratio to stabilize cadence.
nodes.bodyMD:
TS autoscale manages duty and cadence (server/ts/ts-autoscale.ts).

Minimal artifact: TS autoscale snapshot.
nodes.summary: Autoscale TS ratio to stabilize cadence.

Energy field inputs define raster and tokamak formats.

Minimal artifact: input schema snapshot.
nodes.summary: Schema and adapters for pipeline energy fields.

nodes.bodyMD:

nodes.summary: Compute integrals over stress-energy fields.

Minimal artifact: initial data snapshot.
nodes.summary: Initialize GR fields for evolution.

nodes.bodyMD:
Phase diagram validation checks viability accuracy (tools/validate-phase-diagram.ts, tests/viability-validation.ts).

Minimal artifact: validation run output.
nodes.summary: Validate viability outputs against phase diagram expectations.
